	<item>
		<title>How Important is Local Listing For Your Business ?</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/how-important-is-local-listing-for-your-business/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 23 Sep 2015 09:42:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2428</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Wednesday-Wisdom.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-2429" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Wednesday-Wisdom.jpg" alt="Wednesday Wisdom" width="770" height="315" /></a>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Todays tough economic times calls for using all resources at your disposal to ensure you capture your online audiences attention before your competitors do it. Once you have carried out the regular SEO tactics (on page/off page optimization , A/B Testing, on-going strategic approach), you might think that you have done enough.
But is it really enough?</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">If you want your business to really shine through in terms of conversions and sales, then you ought to explore local listings and use its benefits to your advantage. This calls for adding a series of steps to push your local business listing to the front of the right kind of audience.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Imagine from the point of view of your end customer. If suppose, Paul resides in Dallas and wants to order a pizza, he will obviously look up only those pizza houses that operate in the city of Dallas. So when he looks up this information on Google, even if a pizza house from New York, comes top of rankings, will this NY pizza house secure the order from Paul?</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">The answer is obvious - No!</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Thats the power of optimizing for local listing for your brand online.
If you are wondering where to begin optimizing for local listing, lets dig deeper into key success factors for local SEO listing and how it can be achieved.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Factors that give a boost to your local SEO rankings</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Based on our industry experience, we believe there are 4 key signals that determine the success of your local SEO efforts and its performance. These are
1. The Depth of accurate information
2. The effectiveness of Visibility or discoverability of your brand
3. The Reach and coverage of your brand; and
4. The geographic Precision as conveyed by your online marketing channels</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Lets check out how these factors can be tweaked to work in favor of your business.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>1. The Depth of accurate information</strong>
What it is - This refers to the accuracy, depth, and completeness of the location detail given on their website. Almost all the respondents of a Constant Contact survey say that it is important for their business to be discovered on local business listings and directories. Whats astonishing though, is that a staggering 50% of them have not rectified inaccuracies or incorrect listings, even though they know about it!</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">
Why is it needed  The rich content and accurate information helps drive amazing user experience. Better information about local stores, offerings, and products, also enable a much higher online to offline conversion at physical stores.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">How it can be achieved  Publish your NAPW (Name, Address, Phone number and Website details) clearly on all directories. Using product/ service descriptions, images, maps, and videos, too provides tremendous help to users to discover your business better.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>2. The effectiveness of Visibility</strong>
What it is  Visibility improves the overall productivity and effectiveness of the website from a site visitor point of view.Why is it needed  A clean layout and easy navigation prevents site abandonment. The easy to find information prompts users to stay longer on the site thus facilitating the potential to convert better.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">How it can be achieved  Optimize your site better for mobile along with traditional desktops. Facilities such as breadcrumb navigation (to help guide site visitors with their way around the website) help improve the page optimization strategy of the store. You can also add in a store locator that helps users to easily find a store nearest to them.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>3. The Reach of your brand</strong>
What it is  Providing consistent, uniform, and accurate data about your store and products on third party sites denotes the reach of your brand. You need to put in exact store location, NAPW, and relevant local details that stays the same across multiple third party sites of apps such as Google, Facebook, Foursquare, or local yellow page listings.
Why is it needed  Different customers across different search engines, directories, sites, or apps, can be certain to come to a single place when they discover your business. This eliminates consumer confusion and provides a better user experience.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">How it can be achieved  Make sure to claim all pages on these third party sites under your brand and business. Doing so will prevent other competitors from diverting valuable web traffic to their own sites. Update all NAPW and other crucial information on all such pages and keep it accurate and consistent.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>4. The geographic precision</strong>
What it is  The ways in which customers can view your store location on maps software (using pins or pins spread on third party sites) needs to have precise coordinates.
Why is it needed  This factor helps users to visit your store quicker and avoid disappointment from incorrect or incomplete location information online. This also prevents the user from approaching competition.
How it can be achieved  If competing local businesses are located close to each other, you may actually risk handing over your customers to competition on a platter. Hence, keep the coordinates as precise and relevant as possible.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">For your retail business to thrive online and offline, it is extremely important for you to have a distinct optimization strategy comprising of these four basic factors. It ensures that your business isnt killed by incomplete or incorrect local SEO.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Spending on Facebook Ads - The Right Way!</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/spending-on-facebook-ads-the-right-way/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 07 Oct 2015 11:38:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2445</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/certified-Social-Media-Marketing.jpg"><img class=" size-full wp-image-2446 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/certified-Social-Media-Marketing.jpg" alt="certified Social Media Marketing" width="640" height="416" /></a>

You are ready to invest in your success if you have created a Facebook page for your business. But the question is: how much should you be spending on Facebook ads?

Its a question which you are going to face too often. And the easiest way to get an answer is: there is no easy way. The spending can be very low or very high every month.

Yes we know, this answer is not helping you anyway. So here is a break down which will help you learn to invest your money on your Facebook Marketing Campaigns in a right manner.

<b>Increase Relevant Page Likes</b>

Its one of the most important part of your Facebook sales funnel. When it comes about selling on Facebook, its too difficult but you can have insane success when you try to sell to people who like to see your content in their news feeds. So your first priority should be increasing the relevant fan base who are actually interested in buying your product or service. Which means increasing your relevant Likes.

The word Relevant should be your key focus here. Dont try to get cheap likes by targeting on irrelevant countries because you can gain cheap likes by doing so but they arent going to help you earn anything. The cost per like is going to be dependent on your brand, industry or niche. For example, if you are a reputed brand in the entertainment field then its going to be easy but if you are a new law firm, its going to be a tough job.

In short, spending anywhere from $.20 to $1.00 per relevant Facebook like is worth.

So this should be the basic starting point of your expectation depending on your budget. Keep notice that you should not be spending entire of your budget on this. But if you have only $100 budget per month then you can dedicate all of this amount here.

$100: 200 Likes

$500: 750 Likes

$1,000: 1,250 Likes

$5,000: 5,000 Likes

These are only rough estimates which may vary based on many factors.

<b>Promoting Posts</b>

You are suggested to promote your posts which are going to land on your blog. The purpose behind is to increase traffic on your website.

However, not everyone prioritise this thing. Yes, seeking people to see their content may have their objective but website traffic isnt the focus. They just want engagement (likes, comments, shares, etc.).

<strong>Promoting your posts should be your focus with two main goals:</strong>

1. Reach Fans in the News Feed who were missed organically

2. Reach relevant non-Fans in the sidebar

Yes you may be seeking to reach non-fans in news feed as well, but thats not how we recommend to do it. specially in this matter, All we need to focus is to reach our fans first. Reaching non-fans in the sidebar can be cheaper and can include a very small portion of your budget.

Your spending almost depends on the number of fans you currently have. Your goal should be to reach your fans in the news feed at least once. We used to run such kind of ads every week for a day. The motive behind is to reach at least 20% of our current fan base. This is a good starting point as trying to reach 100% of your fans may annoy people. Following this way, only 1/5 of your fan base are seeing ads from you every day.

Our experience says that we can have an expectation of CPM close to $5, It can be more or less but thats a good round number to begin with. So by following these two things (20% reached and a $5 CPM), heres what you can expect to reach 20% of your fan base depending on the size of your audience..

 500 Fans: $.50

 1,000 Fans: $1.00

 10,000 Fans: $10.00

 25,000 Fans: $25.00

 50,000 Fans: $50.00

 100,000 Fans: $100.00

Of-course it is one post. We dont opt to promote more than one post every day but at-least one post per week is recommended. As mentioned above non-fans can also be targeted but with focussing on the sidebar. The CPM is usually under $.03 for an audience of 400,000 when targeting the sidebar only. So for a single promoted post, you may do the following with a $.03 CPM

Things can be expected while promoting a single post with a $.03 CPM are:-

 5,000 Non-Fan Impressions: $.15

 10,000 Non-Fan Impressions: $.30

 100,000 Non-Fan Impressions: $3.00

 250,000 Non-Fan Impressions: $7.50

 500,000 Non-Fan Impressions: $15.00

 1,000,000 Non-Fan Impressions: $30.00

Its all up to you if you choose to reach non-fans as a small or a big part of your budget.

Please make a notice, These are only assumptions. $.03 CPM may vary based on the competition. And as per our experience we dont focus on non-fans its our assumption that the CPM is going to remain the same as you increase the impressions. But you need to increase the target audience size to retain that CPM]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Why do businesses require mobile apps?</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/why-do-businesses-require-mobile-apps/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 14 Oct 2015 08:23:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2456</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Mobile apps no longer remain the forte of just large enterprises. A lot of startups and SMEs are increasingly getting mobile apps built to improve their visibility. We see smart businesses have a dedicated mobile centric strategy to cater to the burgeoning mobile user segment. This segment is proving to be highly influential in driving the fortunes of a business, and hence it makes complete business sense to invest into a mobile app.
Interested to know about the immense value mobile apps derive to businesses? Read on!

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/^DE6AD1284F1050241DAC8A3FDEEF82CC84AC68D19144BCCB67^pimgpsh_fullsize_distr.png"><img class="alignnone wp-image-2457 size-full" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/^DE6AD1284F1050241DAC8A3FDEEF82CC84AC68D19144BCCB67^pimgpsh_fullsize_distr.png" alt="mobile app for business" width="770" height="315" /></a>

1. 24 x 7 visibility  Having an app downloaded is like a mini salesman always in your customers pocket. The psychological advantage of being always visible and accessible holds tremendous potential for businesses, especially considering the fact that mobile users in US spend an average of around 162 minutes daily on their smartphones.

2. Direct and personalized marketing  The app can share various marketing collaterals such as booking forms, orders and personal login credentials. This improves the impact of your marketing and promotional efforts.

3. Engage better  With a mobile app, your business can really transcend competition in terms of customer engagement. The host of options that can be bundled in  messaging option, customer support, location based services, and mobile payments  the options can only be limited by your imagination.

4. Better value  There are lot of examples of providing awe-inspiring value to customer with mobile apps. Take the case of OpenTable, that lets users book a table in a restaurant in a matter of a few clicks. Another instance is the Ola Cabs that lets customers book a ride from a point of origin determined by their phones GPS location. They even allow users to fill virtual Ola Wallets with money credits that can be utilized to pay for the rides

These are just some of the benefits that mobile apps can provide to your business. If you think the time has come to make a debut on mobile screen of users then <a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/ios-development" target="_blank">let's talk apps</a>. Our competencies in native mobile apps across iOS and Android and also hybrid apps (that look, function and feel the same on all types of mobile). Check out the different ways in which TII lets your business target the profitable mobile user segment.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>In the age of Spontaneity Live Streaming is the new Marketing Revolution!</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/in-the-age-of-spontaneity-live-streaming-is-the-new-marketing-revolution/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Oct 2015 08:07:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2464</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="p1"><img class=" size-full wp-image-2465 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/live-streaming.jpg" alt="live streaming" width="760" height="400" /></p>
<p class="p1">The future of visual marketing is very bright in coming years as it is estimated that approximately three quarter of all the web traffic will be video. Business marketers utilize these researches and bring the Live Streaming platforms like Ustream and Bamuser assolutions since 2007, but Meerkat and Periscope are the advanced versions which help people and brands to share moments in fun and entertaining way. Since both the apps are linked to user's Twitter accounts, users can engage their followers in real time by tweeting links tothe live stream.</p>
<p class="p1"><strong>How can LiveStreaming help your Brand?</strong></p>
<p class="p1"><strong>Innovation at its best Streams</strong></p>
<p class="p1"><strong>Meerkat Vs Periscope</strong></p>
<p class="p1">A recent survey on Twitter found that 70% of users prefer watching videos in the news feed over links. Periscope and Meerkat, leading in the streaming revolution, gives companies and individuals similar facilities to live stream from anywhere to anyone.</p>
<p class="p1"><strong>Features of Meerkat</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li class="p1">It is first to launch</li>
	<li class="p1">free to use</li>
	<li class="p1">Assists the users in using the platform</li>
	<li class="p1">Third party apps are needed to access tools</li>
</ul>
<p class="p1"><strong>Periscope</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li class="p1">launched shortly after Meerkat and picked up by Twitter.</li>
	<li class="p1">Free to use</li>
	<li class="p1">It has easy to use interface and a large user community which proves to be a advantage over the other.</li>
	<li class="p1">it lets you select the Target audience</li>
	<li class="p1">it has additional feature of video "save". anyone following you in the app can view the video within 24 hrs of its broadcast.</li>
</ul>
<p class="p1">Both the platforms have become popular exponentially, with their list of followers including the thought leaders and celebritiesin different field</p>
<p class="p1"><em>How can Live Streaming help in adding value to the Your Company?</em></p>

<ul>
	<li class="p1">Set examples by thought leadership. marketing always aims to widen the customer base. you can establish yourself by discussingissues which are a cause of concern for whole industry. host interviews with the other industry leaders to demonstrate collaborative spirt.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Promotional Mode: demonstrating your product or service through live videos gives the viewers a chance not only to understand what you want to explain but also interact if they have any query.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Way of Communication: it can be used either as a way of customer support session or as a way to explain the product or service. People feel more satisfied and effectively dealt with, when they know the face of the your company which needs to be established in the videos</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Conveying the news: followers always appreciate transparency in the way when all the big news are conveyed to hem irrespective of the nature of news whether it is good, bad or worst.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Record or Stream: Marketers should not feel hesitant in recording and sharing videos due to imperfection because viewers do not look for perfection but for genuine interactions.</li>
</ul>
<p class="p1"><strong>Words of Advice</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li class="p1">Plan the Broadcast: the idea of the video should be planned well in time and it should look authentic too to the viewers.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Carter to Audience. giving a chance to the audience to give the feedback in real time ad addressing their queriesgives them a feel of conversing with your brand.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Schedule and repeat. followers should be regularly interacted with and be given opportunity to follow the upcoming scheduled events on regular basis.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li class="p1">Interactions: marketing is fruitful when it engages the audience. it not only gives a face to the Brand but also gives the followers a confidence in your brandfor authenticity.</li>
</ul>
<p class="p1"><strong>Closing Notes</strong></p>
<p class="p1">Social media is about joining a community, interacting and feeling important. Live Video Streaming apps like Meerkat and Periscope give the marketers a way to ensure that you value your followers and are putting enough efforts and time to make them feel as a part of company's community.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>A Better Approach Towards Improving Your Coding Skills</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/how-to-maintain-the-habit-of-learning-coding-skills/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 28 Oct 2015 10:52:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2468</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Learning coding skills is a matter of devoting time and focussing on the subject. In todays fast running life, it is difficult to manage time to learn coding as we have to meet many obligations, maintain a social life, spend time with family and have some personal hobbies too. After all this is done, then we get some time for computers, the problem of concentration to a specific topic arises. 

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/Coding-skills.png"><img src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/Coding-skills.png" alt="Coding skills" width="1280" height="800" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2469" /></a>

You need to learn new things to stay updated with technology. Learning a new language or a new framework can be done in a few months, but from where will you find the discipline you need to inculcate in yourself to improve your skills that prove to be really profitable?

Having good learning habits and learning strategies is the answer to it. Discipline is hard to maintain but a good learning habit will help you build skills for long term. 

Here we are proposing 4 habits that you can adapt in order to help you become better in what you target at.


<strong>Focus on one thing at a time:</strong>

First of all you need to focus on one main topic or the learning project you wish to learn. If you split up your interests amongst many a topics, you wont end up with enough progress towards success. So, its always better to chose a project or topic which interests you rather than the one which is in trend.

<strong>Set your target:</strong>

Plan your course and set a clear target to learning. When you feel that you have completed your course before time, then you can either spend that time reading about it more through related tutorials or reading some books on it or listening to a related podcast.

<strong>Keep progressing regularly:</strong>

Being regular at it or keep doing a bit of it everyday is the key. you can continue doing other things but your main project should be touched up daily and regularly before doing anything else. Its easier to immerse yourself in a new concept if you keep working at it even if its only a little bit each time.


<strong>Learn it from heart:</strong>

If your sole motive is learning, then the project should never be considered 100% finished. you need to enjoy your work, learn what you did on one project and take that experience to the next project. When you learn something from heart, you enjoy that learning and you are always good at utilising what you learnt.


Learning is a never ending process and continues until one wants to learn. There are new things, new skills and many new experiences to learn and share. So the journey should always be enjoyable and satisfying.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[how-to-maintain-the-habit-of-learning-coding-skills]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>8</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="blog"><![CDATA[Blog]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="development"><![CDATA[Development]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Mongo DB 3.2 : A Revolution to be Unfolded</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/mongo-db-3-2-a-revolution-to-be-unfolded/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 04 Nov 2015 11:19:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2478</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[MongoDB 3.2 is a giant leap forward that helps organizations standardize on a single database for their new and mission oriented applications.Mongo DB introduces the new storage engines that help you optimally utilise the technology for varying workloads in the organisation.

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Mongo-DB-3.2.jpg"><img src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Mongo-DB-3.2.jpg" alt="Mongo DB 3.2" width="3125" height="1677" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2479" /></a>


Mongo 3.2 has come up with many a new and revolutionary features. 
Some of those are as follows:-

1)<strong>Validations</strong>. It has come up with a new feature of adding validations to the fields in the document. The validator is a match expression which must be true for a document to be inserted or updated.It has other specification as well which says that validators only apply to insert and update operations which means existing data in the collection is not validated.

2)<strong>Look Up</strong> . MongoDB 3.2 introduces tools and enhancements that empower data analysts to spark innovation using new insights from previous data. This tool builds a pipeline in which you can put your selected documents and then perform various operations to get the required information. It has "from" parameter which asks for collection which needs to be analysed. There's then an on parameter which says which field to use in that collection and which field in the document pipeline it should match. Then the matched document is put into the pipeline to fetch relevant results.

3)<strong>Partial Indexes</strong>.  Partial indexes in 3.2 allow you to specify a filtering expression during index creation to include only documents that meet your desired conditions  saving you memory and disk space while speeding up queries even further as smaller indexes mean faster searches.

4)<strong>Customizable Back-ups</strong>. With 3.2, backup files managed by Ops Manager can now be stored on standard network-mountable file systems to make use of your existing storage infrastructure. Backups can also be configured for specific collections rather than the entire database to avoid over-provisioning.

5)<strong>Easy Database Recovery</strong>. Development, test and recovery clusters can now be safely and reliably built with new automation-driven restores. In a few simple clicks, Ops Manager agents can pull database snapshots from MongoDB backups and configure them as a live, running database cluster.

This is the first look at the database level operations that we should expect in MongoDB 3.2. Most of the other MongoDB 3.2 changes are with storage engines, authentication, integration and replication. MongoDB 3.2 features new tools and added functionality that will allow administrators to explore data and seamlessly optimize deployment.


]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>HTML - An essential part of Development</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/html-an-essential-part-of-development/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Nov 2015 09:54:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2482</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="aligncenter wp-image-2483 size-full" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/HTML.jpg" alt="HTML" width="512" height="386" />

It is a standard markup language which is used to create web pages. It is used by most of the websites to create visually engaging webpages, for developing user interfaces for many mobile applications. HTML is known as a markup language as it describes the structure of a website semantically along with cues for presentation. HTML elements form the building blocks of all websites as it allows images and objects to be embedded and create an interactive form. It is used to format the text, layout, images and links which we see on a webpage.

HTML is good not just in pursuing a career but also in many ways to anyone who is not professionally trained in computer languages and coding. Some of the reasons for why should all of us have some knowledge about HTML are:

<strong>1) Helps in Official Communication</strong>
As a decade ago computers had started becoming a part and parcel of life, internet has already become a part of our daily life. Be it a student or a professional everyone uses a web browser for everything like mails, team maintenance or project management on intranet sites.
Most frameworks used for businesses have simplifies markup language used by default. These frameworks accept properly formed HTML formatting, which affords many publishing options

<strong>2) Makes You Self Efficient</strong>
As a part of updating the company's website one needs to make regular changes in the website. Acquiring the basic knowledge about HTML and web standards is very beneficial as making minor changes in your website will make you not dependant on web designers, paying every time but will make you self efficient and help You make relevant changes very easily.

<strong>3)Makes You a better Blogger</strong>
In todays world where everyone expresses ones views on anything and everything and shares ones knowledge by writing blogs, attaining knowledge about HTML can help you gain much following. As learning just a smidge of HTML coding with a bit of CSS or JavaScript can make your fingertips far more powerful than your regular blogging software could.

A single line of HTML code helps insert movies or media in the posts, not to mention tackling custom layouts, animated elements, and more. It adds a spark to blog's widgets and plug-ins when you can easily customise them with a good understanding of HTML with CSS or Javascript.

<strong>4) Helps in Routine Jobs</strong>
HTML being a very simple language to learn, makes huge difference to the normal webpages. From ebay auctions where with visually rich HTML-formatted descriptions usually sell better and faster than less compelling counterparts, to making beautiful invites, to designing email messages, to updating news on community website and many other tasks can be done easily and effectively with a little HTML familiarity.

Concluding by simple words that learning HTML is like having a wonder wand in ones own hand and adding magical sparks to simple webpages. It helps you save money by not paying off to web designers, helps customise your blog posts, making an routine works can add up to your efficiency.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>6 Tips to create an impeccable social media content</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/6-tips-to-create-an-impeccable-social-media-content/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 25 Nov 2015 11:17:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2485</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="p1"><a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Social-media-content.jpg"><img class=" size-full wp-image-2487 alignnone" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Social-media-content.jpg" alt="Social media content" width="900" height="629" /></a></p>
<p class="p1">Social Media is a group of internet based apps that allows the users to create, share and exchange information, ideas, pictures, videos and even career interests. Social media is becoming the need of the hour and necessity for every business as Content is the core of all the digital marketing initiatives. Content is what people find when they search on search engines. Content is what people read and share on social media. Content is the way brands narrate their stories and connect to their customers. Everyone aims at improving their social media and content marketing. Here are some of the top tips to help you with a better hand in written content as you need to put thought and structure behind the content.</p>
<p class="p1"><b>1. KNOW YOUR AUDIENCE.</b></p>
<p class="p1">You can tell your story to a person who is interested in listening to you. Same way you can connect to your audience only when you know them. Knowing your audience means getting a better understanding of their interests, needs, mindsets and behaviors so that you become an important part of their lives.</p>
<p class="p1"><b>2. PROVIDE VALUE.</b></p>
<p class="p1">The content through which you connect should add value to the audience. Value can be either in education, productivity, entertainment or cost savings. Consumer should feel that you are a well wisher and not a marketer. Your content should provide long term awareness and brand recall.</p>
<p class="p1"><b>3. ADD IMAGES TO THE CONTENT.</b></p>
<p class="p1">Pictures or images have always fascinated human eye more than simple content. No matter how valuable the content is , your audience engagement and interactions lose out majorly.</p>
<p class="p1"><b>4. CONTENT SHOULD BE SHARED MORE THAN ONCE.</b></p>
<p class="p1">Blog Posts need to be shared more than once as it has multiple benefits like getting more traffic, reaching out people in different time zones and reaching to the people who have recently started following you</p>
<p class="p1"><b>5. KNOW YOUR DIMENSIONS.</b></p>
<p class="p1">Your audience or the people who you connect to, do not share the content because it looks good, but they do so because it helps them to look good. If the content is inappropriately cropped then the chances of it being shared gets minimal. The content should be properly displayed on different social networks and various dimensions of each channel and how often the audience finds the content, should be considered and manage</p>
<p class="p1"><b>6. MEASURE SUCCESS</b></p>
<p class="p1">Determining the objective of your content and what basis you use to measure its performance and success is important. Success can be measured by identifying the fulfilment of the objectives for which apiece of content or a blog post or a facebook message was created.</p>
<p class="p1">By following the above said steps like knowing your audience, providing them value through your content, adding visuals or pictures to your content for better engagements, determining the frequency of sharing the content, knowing the dimensions and creating a plan for measuring the success of the content, your objective to have an effective presence on social media is achieved.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>A Quick Look at PHP 7 -  New Features and Enhancements</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/a-quick-look-at-php-7-new-features-and-enhancements/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 16 Dec 2015 12:36:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2497</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[PHP has been the fourth most popular programming language in the world. It has powered for more than 200 million websites making it more than 81.7% of public websites. With the introduction of PHP 7, many significant changes have been made to PHP since 2004 at the time of release of PHP 5. PHP 7 is embeded with explosive performance improvements, significantly reduced memory usage and a host of new features to make the apps soar.

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/PHP7.jpg"><img class="  wp-image-2498 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/PHP7.jpg" alt="PHP7" width="678" height="339" /></a>

With the new Zend Engine 3.0, PHP 7 has 2x faster performance and 50% lesser memory consumption over PHP5.6. These features have been built in PHP 7 to allow you to serve more concurrent users without adding any hardware.

PHP 7 has come up with loads of features like faster performance, less resources and cool new features like scalar type declarations, spaceship Operator, anonymous classes and many more. PHP 7 contains a number of breaking changes, such removal of PHP safe mode, magic quotes and number of reserved keywords and others.

PHP 7.0 comes with a new version of Zend Engine, numerous improvements and new features added are:

1. Improved performance: PHP 7 is up to twice as fast as PHP 5.6
2. Significantly reduced memory usage
3. Abstract Syntax Tree
4. Consistent 64-bit support
5. Improved Exception hierarchy
6. Many fatal errors converted to Exceptions
7. Secure random number generator
8. Removed old and unsupported SAPIs and extensions
9. Return and Scalar Type Declarations
10.Zero cost asserts
11.Return and Scalar Type Declarations]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>How to Get Most Out of Your Image Optimisation Strategy?</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/how-to-get-most-out-of-your-image-optimisation-strategy/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 23 Dec 2015 12:32:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2502</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="size-full wp-image-2796" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/image-seo-optimization.jpg" alt="photo coming soon - teared note paper pinned on bulletin board - horizontal image" width="900" height="600" />
<p class="p1">If you want more traffic on your website, you must optimise the images as they generate a ton of traffic from Google Images. Have you ever puzzled over what image file types should be used or if there is a need to add file names and alt text to every image on the website?</p>
<p class="p1">For effective SEO and for more traffic on your site following are some of the best practices:</p>
<p class="p1">1) Alt Text</p>
<p class="p1">2) File Size</p>
<p class="p1">3) File name</p>
<p class="p1">4) Captions</p>
<p class="p1">5) File Types</p>
<p class="p1">6) Sitemap</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>Alt Text</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">Alt text refers to a text alternative for images. Many a times it happens when we try to open an email on desktop or mobile and the images don't get loaded. As a part of effective SEO, we want to take advantage of writing a descriptive, keyword rich alt text to increase the likelihood of click-through rates even if our images can't render properly for our users. Additionally, if an image is decided to be taken as a link, it should be assured that alt text is included in it and that text is relevant to the link's destination for a healthy user experience.</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>Image Size.</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">User is most important for a search engine like Google, so the chances of an image being most visible widens when an image reflects what users search for. For images the best approach is to have high quality and easy to engage images. Following are some of the guidelines:</p>
<p class="p1">i) use clear and crisp photos</p>
<p class="p1">ii) crop the images to the correct size of page width.</p>
<p class="p1">iii) show a smaller image and provide<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>option for a larger view.</p>
<p class="p1">iv) Reduce the color depth to lowest acceptable levels.</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>Image File Name.</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">having a detailed filename for an image is the key. the aim of giving an image a detailed or descriptive filename is to make Google or any search engine comprehend the image, so that it can help in a good user experience. But it should not be spammy by writing excessively long or keyword stuffed file names.</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>Captions.</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">As per Google, it is a good idea to make sure that images are placed nearest to the relevant text and along with it providing good and descriptive captions to images add up to give an advantage.</p>
<p class="p1">Elements to be considered are:</p>
<p class="p1">i) the number of intervening words between the text and the image.</p>
<p class="p1">ii) the number of intervening table data tags between text and image.</p>
<p class="p1">iii) the number of intervening table rows tags between text and the image.</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>File Type.</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">It is advices to use commonly supported filetypes. it is commonly known that the most widely accepted and recommended type of image file type is JPEG and PNG as the second choice. So, it is a good to have the commonly supported file type matched with file name.</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>Image Sitemap.</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">Another important piece of advise for effective optimzation of image is to supply an image sitemap. Providing a sitemap is an effective way to help search engines to discover the images. Images should be consolidated into a single directory rather than spreading it out in numerous directories and sub-directories. This helps webmasters to stay organized and fetch data easily.</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1"><b>Closing Notes</b></span></p>
<p class="p1">In conclusion, optimising images on your website helps in SEO for maximising search engine benefits. We consider optimising the content and images for better rankings but the top most priority is User Experience. Great image content is an excellent way for site effectiveness. All the above steps should be considered for "icing on the cake" experience.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[interface_sidebarlayout]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Zray Plugin Contest Final 5!</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/zray-plugin-contest-final-5/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 06 Jan 2016 10:06:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2513</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[What a great news it is from Zend Technologies today that Techies India Inc. has made it to final Top 5 plugin contest initiated at Zend Con 2015.

The contest is about developing ZRay plugins &amp; we have submitted ZRay plugin for Yii Framework.

You can view the plugin in live environment at <a href="http://bit.ly/22KcdJE">http://bit.ly/22KcdJE</a>

The Yii2 plugin extends Z-Ray to display Yii2 information on all the various Yii2 elements constructing the page, including Asset bundles, SQL queries, and logs, together with general information on the setup and the request.
<ul>
	<li>Asset Bundles</li>
	<li>DB Logger</li>
	<li>Logger</li>
	<li>Page Info</li>
	<li>Extensions</li>
	<li>Config Info</li>
</ul>
<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/panel-2.gif"><img class="  aligncenter wp-image-2508" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/panel-2.gif" alt="panel-2" width="762" height="196" /></a>

These Plugins are snippets of code that extend Zend Server and Z-Ray to support specific development environments. Plugins are developed by, and for, Zend Server and Z-Ray users, and are available in the <a href="http://www.zend.com/en/products/server/plugins">Zend Gallery</a>  an online marketplace for sharing and downloading these extensions.

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/zend-server.png"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-2518" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/zend-server.png" alt="zend server" width="758" height="345" /></a>

During the contest, 21 new plugins were submitted to the Zend Gallery, extending Zend Server and Z-Ray to support a wide spectrum ofPHP applications, frameworks, databases and extensions.

You can see a full list of all theplugins/authors<a href="http://blog.zend.com/2015/12/10/thank-you-to-plugin-contributors/">here</a>.

According to the contest rules, and after long consideration, the plugins listed below were chosen for their creativity, usability, quality, and overall coolness.

Its now up to you to decide which plugin is the final winner of the contest! View the live demos and info detailed below, and place your vote!

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/Vote-for-Yii-Plugin-for-ZRay-by-Techies-India-Inc..png"><img class="  wp-image-2519 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/Vote-for-Yii-Plugin-for-ZRay-by-Techies-India-Inc..png" alt="Vote for Yii Plugin for ZRay by Techies India Inc." width="691" height="551" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Project Management  An Introductory Glance</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/project-management-an-introductory-glance/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 20 Jan 2016 11:03:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2524</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class=" size-full wp-image-2526 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/Project-Management.png" alt="Project Management" width="800" height="368" />

Months of efforts putting together huge volume of data/code/documentation and interaction among multiple employees  this is a surefire recipe for catastrophe if not handled with care with help of an appropriate project management tool. Check out what constitutes project management and how it can be utilized with incredible effect within your organisation.

<strong>What is project management?</strong>

Most of us have come across some form of project management or other in our professional lives. To define it broadly, it is the use of tools and automation, to help in carrying out various tasks and activities in a project, so that it is executed successfully.

<strong>How to enable seamless project management?</strong>

Right from initiation to final delivery, there are many milestones in a project comprising of smaller tasks. Getting all these done right, on time and within budget will need you to subscribe to one or more of the following project management tools 

4. <span style="text-decoration: underline;">Freedcamp</span>  Sounds like Basecamp and performs like it too! With unlimited users and projects, intuitive design, task tracking, communication and collaboration for success is truly possible. Its stunning design is an added plus factor.

3. <span style="text-decoration: underline;">Zoho Projects</span>  This one is my favorite. Right from prospecting to post sales invoicing, it lets you do all. Planning, monitoring, and collaborating is accomplished easily here. With the free version, there is also a 20/month version for advanced features.

2. <span style="text-decoration: underline;">Asana</span>  In just 7 years, Asana has racked up 400,000 users, a good indicator of its rising popularity. With a simplistic yet insight- packed user interface, knowing the progress and status of your projects is now a matter of a few clicks.

1. <span style="text-decoration: underline;">Bitrix 24</span> The easy user interface and comprehensive features make it a widely used free PM tool. With CRM, Gantt charts and layered task features, multi-employee collaboration and project monitoring becomes easy

It is common for businesses today to juggle multiple projects simultaneously. However with the use of project management tools, you can easily transition from average, to awesome client servicing. Do write in to us and let us know which tools help your organization to make this transition.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Learn Python in 2016? We say why not?</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/learn-python-in-2016-we-say-why-not/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 10 Feb 2016 11:02:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2529</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class=" size-full wp-image-2530 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Why-Learn-Python.png" alt="Why Learn Python" width="700" height="700" />

As a developer you may have come across a myriad of options when it comes to learning new programming languages in the New Year. How about going for a programming language that first released in 1991 and is still wildly popular across the globe 25 years later? How about mastering a programming language that is the top choice for 1/3<sup>rd</sup> of the developers?

Yes, we are talking about <strong><em>Python</em></strong>, your very own multi-paradigm, high-level programing language.

Offering smooth compatibility with major programming protocols such as OOP, imperative and functional programming, Python remains the worldwide favorite for developers. Lets look at some more compelling reasons why it makes total sense to start learning Python- from today itself 
<ul>
	<li><strong>Learning curve</strong>  To start off, the language was initially designed to be fun to use. This aspect is the number one reason why developers still vouch for the minimal learning curve of the language. Most of the complex stuff is handled efficiently by the language, hence you need not worry too much about the little details and instead focus on the bigger picture.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<ul>
	<li><strong>Good for beginner</strong>  Vast repository of standard library, access to resources for prototype building, and English like syntax, are great motivators for beginners to continue learning the language to its fruition. The easy to understand nature is what keep beginners going, especially those who are on a self-learning mode.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<ul>
	<li><strong>Versatility</strong>  Right from computer games and desktop apps, to high end analytical systems and artificial intelligence, you can build almost any type of solution using Python. This gives a lot of versatility to a Python programmer to showcase his/ her value to a multitude of domains across industry verticals.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<ul>
	<li><strong>Community support</strong>  A programming language is arguably only as good as the online community backing it receives across the globe. Look at any popular community site and you see a considerable presence of Python programmers trying to solve various interesting problems around the language. Be it StackOverflow (5<sup>th</sup> largest community here), Meetup (having 1369 groups) or GitHub (more than 950 projects around Python with 500+ stars), Python dominates most of the big time tech communities.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<ul>
	<li><strong>Career opportunities</strong>  Lets face it  the real reason why we go for a new learning course is to enhance our career options. And this is where Pythion scores big time. Angel List shows Python as the #2 in-demand technology skill. It shows an average salary of $93k, making it a lucrative option for programmers looking to make the next big leap.</li>
</ul>
In addition, Python has some dedicated solutions around it that makes a developers life simpler. For instance the PyGames engine helps Python developers craft interactive games using the programming language. Also it offers amazing integration with a lot of Windows software programs in form of Py2exe.

Learning Python definitely has its advantage and gears your career towards success. So write in to us and let us know when will you be starting with learning Python this year.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>What you need to know about Digital Marketing in 2016?</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/what-you-need-to-know-about-digital-marketing-in-2016/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 29 Feb 2016 09:31:41 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2536</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

Howdy friends,

Now that 2016 has started creating lots of buzz around, this is the right time for us to touch base on what we think will be the most happening trends in the <a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/internet-marketing">Digital Marketing</a> landscape in 2016. They range from the disruptive (think buy buttons) to the hot-again (mobile, yes, again!).

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/SEO-in-2016.jpg"><img class="  wp-image-2537 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/SEO-in-2016.jpg" alt="SEO Search Engine Optimization Blue Squares On Top" width="705" height="323" /></a>

Lets look at these trends that will dominate the technology ecosystem -
<ul>
	<li><strong>Wearables</strong>  When giants like Samsung and Apple fight for a piece of pie in this segment, rest assured something massive will come up in this zone. For marketers, the emphasis will shift to this up and coming segment (along with its associated early mover challenges).</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Mobile</strong>  Mobile outnumbers desktops is old news now. Marketers need to enhance the user experience provided by mobile centric strategies with help of native functionalities like camera, accelerometer or GPS.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Videos</strong>  Videos are emerging as the favorite content creation tools for marketers. Videos are proven acquisition techniques for online visibility. And stats like <a href="http://www.reelseo.com/b2b-marketers-video-roi/">these</a> show exactly why they are here to stay.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Automation</strong>  Marketing automation is poised to provide tremendous gains to early movers. With significantly higher RoI and accelerated conversion, this step holds tremendous potential to digital marketers in various areas like scheduling social media posting or emails, and segmenting potential leads for better targeting.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Targeted PPC</strong>  With the advent on Customer Match by Google, marketers can equate search engines and social media with targeted email marketing. This way they get more avenues to get closer to prospective customers and move them further into the sales funnel.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Virtual Reality</strong>  Oculus Rifts head mounted display is poised to launch later in 2016. With it, marketers are already rolling their sleeves, conjuring apt strategies that will work with this amazing new and catchy method of online advertising.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Facebook Messenger for Business</strong>  Since its launch in March 2015, this channel has provided businesses the opportunity to expose their brand to more than 700 million FB users online. You can avail of advantages like real time customer interactions, better targeted ads, and push notifications on mobile, to elevate the degree of customer experience to your benefit.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Buy Buttons</strong>  Many popular social interaction and search platforms are looking at direct selling by introducing a buy now button for products listed. While Google has been in testing since July 2015, buy buttons are also slated to appear in Twitter and Pinterest this year.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Podcasts</strong>  This is an unconventional marketing move that is bound to have customers sit up and be all-ears to your brand in 2016. Take the case of Umpqua Bank that launched a podcast on money matters and personal financing, which went on to be downloaded more than 70000 times.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Social advertising</strong>  With a projected spend of ~$36 billion in 2017, social ads are growing bigger by the day. As a marketer you need to narrow down on 2-3 key platforms and spend better on fresh content with appropriate calls-to-action to pique reader interest.</li>
</ul>
Be on the lookout for these trends and be ready for digital success in 2016.
<pre><span style="color: #99cc00;">If you have any Digital Marketing project to discus, <a style="color: #99cc00;" href="http://techiesindiainc.com/contact-us">Contact Us</a></span></pre>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Some Common iOS Development Mistakes You Should Avoid</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/some-common-ios-development-mistakes-you-should-avoid/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Mar 2016 12:08:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2545</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Irrespective of their individual features or functionalities, every app is here to make life easy for users. From ordering your favorite delicacies to booking hotel reservations, users can now perform a gamut of operations on the go. This calls for keeping in mind some key mistakes to avoid so that you can elevate the user experience and ease of use of the mobile app  key enablers needed to accelerate your business growth objectives. Here is our compilation -

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/iOS-Development.jpg"><img class=" size-full wp-image-2547 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/iOS-Development.jpg" alt="iOS Development" width="698" height="400" /></a>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Ignoring the Importance of Beta Testing</strong></li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">
It is great to <a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/ios-development">Develop an attractive iOS application</a>. But it is also imperative to make it functional. Seeking assistance from Beta Testers will prove to be the smartest move in this context.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">
Beta testers are not just general iPhone users. Rather they belong to the segment of audience capable of assessing your apps functionality, and offering useful feedbacks for its improvement. Avoiding beta testing will be one of the grave errors in your iOS app development life cycle.</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Ignoring Development Errors</strong></li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">
It is not a crime to commit errors. However, it would be nothing short of blasphemy to deal with them in an erroneous and silly manner. Whenever there is an error, you must have a positive approach towards dealing with it.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">
Confusing your users will only lead to your apps failure and nothing more.</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Using social media for forceful login</strong></li>
</ul>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">
In a time when user experience seems to be of paramount importance, social media plug-ins on your app will prove to be of little use. Do not thrust your app on users and force them to use it. Try to keep social media login as a subtle option along with standard registration through emails.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;"><strong>Final thoughts</strong></p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">
Steer clear of stuffing your apps with too much functionality. Keeping it simple and avoiding these errors will ensure sustained success for your app post release on the iOS App Store.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Do <strong><a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/contact-us">write in to us</a></strong>if you have an iOS Application to develop.</p>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>What do we know about latest Instagram Update - #TurnMeOn</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/what-do-we-know-about-latest-instagram-update-turnmeon/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 11:19:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2550</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[By giving more importance to user interests, Instagram will be following Facebooks footsteps quite soon. According to rumor mills, this social sharing platform will soon feature user feeds in their order of preferences. While doing so, Instagram plans to a give a miss to the conventional chronological order of listing posts, thus featuring posts that users care about the most.

<a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Instagram-update.png"><img class=" size-full wp-image-2551 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Instagram-update.png" alt="Instagram update" width="640" height="640" /></a>

Instagrams new algorithm will sort feeds and posts according to certain parameters. User interests, timeliness of the feeds, and your relationship with the person sharing it will determine the order of the posts.

In a nutshell, Instagram wishes to reach your special and prized moments to you first. By offering you a glimpse of your favorite incidents and cherished moments, the platform will help you catch up with all the action of your life.

<strong>Reasons for this update </strong>

Is it without reason that Instagram is suddenly stepping into the shoes of its parent company? Well, the platform has strong reasons of its own. Instagram says that it has close to 400-million active users per month. However, nearly all of them miss a whopping 70% of contents posted on their feeds.

Such trends have pushed the company towards making this announcement.

<strong>Consequences </strong>

Earlier when Facebook chose stories and engaging contents over traditional chronological orders, millions of users reacted outrageously. The scenario is no different in case of Instagram, and numerous users are downright unhappy with this decision.

<strong>Do you stand a chance?</strong>

In spite of this major change, there are still lots of opportunities and scope left for users. If you wish your posts to enjoy the same popularity it did before, without getting drowned in oblivion, try out the following things.
<ul>
	<li>Get your followers to switch on their notifications</li>
	<li>Create fresh and relevant contents</li>
	<li>Connect with people nurturing similar interests</li>
	<li>Track your posts and find out what gets maximum attention</li>
</ul>
<strong>Signing off </strong>

We know that change is a constant factor. And the social media platforms have proved it time and again. Here is our way of alerting you to take necessary steps and continue enjoying enhanced brand visibility on Instagram.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Business Manager account</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/business-manager-account/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 26 Dec 2016 08:02:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/?p=207</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img src="http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/image28-300x300.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="300" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-76" />
<p>Do you think that mobile apps are just about matching candies or sharing pictures of your cats or catch a PokeMon? Reconsider your thoughts.</p>
					<p>None of us can deny the fact that in this era of smartphones and tablets have given todays businesses a new approach and opportunity to reach your target audience at the click of a button. With the exponential growth of smartphone & tablet users, mobile apps have become an integral part of the businesses just like websites are indispensable for every business entity. According to recent IDC research report, nearly 80% of smartphone users spend 22 hours on phones and further on 80% of this time is spent using apps. So if you want to win your customers, you need to be in their reach anytime and anywhere.</p>
					<p>Still thinking on how will the increase in smartphone users contribute to your customer base? Here we bring 7 reasons to help you know the importance of mobile apps for your business.</p>
<strong>Need of Customer</strong>: Todays tech savvy customers are so accustomed to using apps that they use it for everything. From listening to music, to shopping online, to getting coupons, to connecting to the brands they love and much more customers use their mobiles and tablets almost for everything. Smartphones are getting smarter every day and business owners around the world are tapping into this smartness by getting mobile apps developed for their brands. So to attract more customers, make sure you too have one representing your brand in their devices.

<strong>Added channel for business</strong>: One of the biggest advantages of having a mobile app is the opportunity to inform your customers. It can be about anything you want including special offers or promotions, or introduction of a new product line at their fingertips. With the growing trend of mobile apps, customer prefers to use e-commerce channels as they are quick and offer wider range. Your mobile app helps your business in this direction and making it capable to understand your customers better.

<strong>Build Brand and its Recognition</strong>: Success of your business critically depends on your brand and without an app your brand might appear distanced from latest technology trends. A mobile app is actually like a blank bill board, to which you can add features and designs that your customers will love and get attracted to. A mobile app is a natural extension of your company and a great opportunity to showcase your products and services. Having a beautiful mobile app designed for your business helps your brand by enhancing customer experience and foster brand recognition and your customer relationship.

<strong>Direct connect with your customers</strong>: With a mobile app, you have the power to directly connect with your customers. Unlike other social media networks, who decide as to whom to show your posts, you can provide them general info, prices, booking forms, search features, messengers and much more. Through push notification you can get even in closer interaction and remind your customers about your products & services or any special event or announcements.

<strong>Edge over competition</strong>: 'Customer' is the King for any business. Plead you King with something your competitors dont offer. Make your presence felt and be where your target audience is. A mobile app takes you far above your local competition and makes your business location independent. You can drive more action out of your customers by sending those alerts about the latest deals and discounts that they can avail at their nearest stores. Mobile apps allow you to keep in regular touch with your customers anytime and anywhere.

<strong>Better Customer Loyalty</strong>: Customer loyalty is the most important reason for your business which ensures that same customer returns to you time and again. With all that noise around- in form of billboards, newspaper ads, T.V. ads, Facebook ads, websites, website banners etc. the final impact on customers is lost somehow. Only an app can help you to make a genuine and sincere approach to your customer of your product/service. Offer your app users exclusive discounts, content or direct access to your business which keeps them engaged and feel important. A more favourable behaviour is expected out of customers when they know that you are just a tap away and this cultivates loyalty towards your brand.

With all these benefits of having a mobile app, we feel that you would be convinced to have one for your own business. Mobile app will soon be an essential component of every business, as this is the age of smartphones and smart customers. Get an app developed for your brand and harness a better user experience and improved sales graph.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Turbocharge your Node.js Web App with These Neat and Easy Tips</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/turbocharge-your-node-js-web-app-with-these-neat-and-easy-tips/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 08:07:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2564</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class=" size-full wp-image-2565 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/nodejs1.jpg" alt="nodejs1" width="686" height="381" />

Node.js has proven its mettle over the years with amazing versatility and speed in web application development. If you are thinking of using Node.js as your go-to technology for building and deploying fast web apps then this blog is just for you. This is our compilation of ways to turbocharge Node.js so that execution and read/write happens faster than fast 
<ul>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Doing more on client side </strong> Instead of rendering on the server side, you can look at doing more heavy lifting on the client side. This can be easily accomplished by introducing APIs that send JSON requests. This can be picked up by a framework on the client side and then rendered on the front end accordingly.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Adapt asynchronous </strong>Node.js is built single-threaded by default, hence asynchronous code should be preferred over synchronous code (which means the entire application code becomes unreachable). If you are using third party APIs, aim to have as less number of synchronous calls as possible, to boost app performance.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Caching </strong> Utilize the prowess of caching to give more fire to your Node.js web app speed. All non-routine, non-repetitive, or non-changing data can be cached, so that the volume of JavaScript requests can come down. Some examples of such data can be login details, upgrade/downgrade information on clients subscription, etc.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Middleware Optimization</strong> Most read/write data make use of an HTTP/PHP API component that can be slow to fetch and transmit data. Instead of this, you can add a Node control directly into the application, so that you fetch only what you need, instead of the whole database.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Remove Complexity </strong> The thought process here is, if you bloat it, you gotta let it go. For instance, jQuery UI; while it may provide neat flexibility, it doesnt work well with many older browser version. The same advantage can be acquired with HTML5 native functionalities, but minus the unneeded codes.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Go Flat </strong> Flat designs have been proven to speed up the application substantially. By not going too deep into unnecessary CSS gradients or even something as tiny as shadow boxes, you can really pump up the CPU power to fire up your Node.js web application execution.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Slow Animations </strong> How about halving that CSS transition time? Feel it is too small to make a difference? Believe me when I say that this factor can make a real, tangible difference to the app execution speed. It is really worth the effort to cut down on animation effects.</li>
	<li style="margin-bottom: 17px;"><strong>Gzip </strong> Gzip enabled browsers can save a lot of data fetching time by letting the server to compress the data before sending it to the browser request. On the other hand, if gzip compression is not turned on, then the sending from the server and the receiving from the browser, will be a delayed experience.Which of these will be in your checklist for the next Node.js web app development project? Do write in to us and let us know.</li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>

	<item>
		<title>Facebooks Latest Algoritm Update and Its Impact on Businesses</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/facebooks-latest-algoritm-update-impact-businesses/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 02 Jun 2016 13:08:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2614</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="size-full wp-image-2615 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/FB-Algorithm-update.png" alt="FB Algorithm update" width="800" height="341" />

<strong>What was the update all about?</strong>
Facebook had announced the change to its News Feed for the third time in the past few months. This time the update has been made by the company to promote quality pieces that users actually want to read.
Facebook's algorithm update aims at killing Clickbait and weed out bad content by showing more content that matters to its viewers. The motive of introducing such an algorithm is to understand, which posts, stories or content it should show on top in your News Feed to keep you interested and engulfed in reading. The Social networking giant has surveyed its users on relevancy of the content and the time they spend on viewing a post and hence concluded to change its News Feed accordingly. Facebook wants to improve its user experience by serving them more content that they really care about. The company is also finding ways to minimize how frequently you will see multiple posts from same source within your News Feed.

<strong>How Has It Impacted Businesses?</strong>
Facebook's Clickbait purge has ripples effect on publishers as now user engagement has become more valuable than just quantity of the click through. It is great news for users but might not please marketers or media sites with Facebook pages. The company started tracking on to how much time a user spends on finding content so that it could use this metrics or keywords a user posts to find posts that interests him. Though it will continue to take likes, shares, comments and clicks into consideration, it will add this new factor to show those posts up in its News Feed that doesnt have much interaction but still are enjoyed by the users.

<strong>Does It Really Have Any Significant Changes?</strong>
According to VentureBeat, Facebook doesnt think Pages will see any significant changes, but at the same time declares that some users may see a small increase in referral traffic, while some others could see minor decreases. Publishers with high-frequency and low quality will certainly get dinged. With the introduction of this algorithm, Facebook is eliminating the tool which companies used for getting more clicks but recently added Audience Optimization tools that will allow publishers to narrowly target their posts.

<strong>How Social Media Marketers Can Make The Best Use of It?</strong>

This update declares loud and clear that Content is the King and Serious Journalism is going to get rewarded. Marketers and publishers will have to re-evaluate their content before they publish, present and promote to hold reader's attention. For more chances to get their posts served over again, they will have to ensure that their content has in-depth stories, interactive content and a variety which interests the audience. With this, Facebook has given a clear message that user engagement and interests matters to it more than anything else. Another big change that Facebook will bring with this update is that it will limit the frequency of posts from same publisher to the same user.

Thats all for now, We hope it was worth spending your time to read this article. Stay tuned for our next edition.

<strong>Have a Social Media Project to Discuss? <a href="http://techiesindiainc.com/contact-us">Leave Us a Message Here</a></strong>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Facebook 360 Degree Videos Coming to your Newsfeed!</title>
		<link>http://dreamhtml.com/techies-new/facebook-360-degree-videos-coming-newsfeed/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Jun 2016 11:23:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesindiainc.com/?p=2635</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class=" wp-image-2638 aligncenter" src="http://techiesindiainc.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Screen-Shot-2016-06-16-at-11.29.12-am.png" alt="Screen Shot 2016-06-16 at 11.29.12 am" width="680" height="337" />

Theres another great news for Facebook users, its the all-new 360 Degree videos coming to your News Feed.

Engaging with a new medium is best done by the users who are willing to experiment with the innovations and inventions. Its a life changing experience for both the users as well as the publishers. Publishers are allowed to take the audience to a different world by 360 videos and photos and showcase their story in a most impressive and innovative way.
<h4><strong>What is 360 degree video all about?</strong></h4>
Facebook bought Oculus, a virtual Reality Company in March 2014. The social media giant has now put the acquisition to use, and develop its innovation.

In September 2015, it was announced that Facebook is bringing 360 Degree videos to your News Feed. It was available on web and Android Devices only. Later, in November, Facebook started rolling out support to iphone and ipad for 360 Degree videos and ads.

Announcing the addition to the News Feed, CEO Mark Zuckerburg said in a facebook post, 360 video is a completely new experience because you can move the camera around. This opens new ways of sharing experiences and makes you feel like you're part of what you're watching. It's a step towards even more immersive experiences."

Adding to the announcement, Zuckerburg said that the panning around feature of 360 videos will let the users experience the kind of thing most people will never see in their lives. He sounded quite excited for the new video feature on Facebook will encourage its users to share a lot of 360 degree content.
<h4><strong>360 Degree Videos For Mobile Devices                </strong></h4>
A 360 degree video is the one which lets you view a scene at 360 degrees. In other words 360 degree video puts the user in the centre of action and takes a full view all around. These videos are labelled with 360 video logo. If you are watching it on a mobile device, you can move your device in actual to get the view from different angles or you can drag your fingers onto the screen to shift perspective in the video. But if you are watching it on a computer, you can have the view by dragging the cursor.

For iOS devices to support 360 Videos, iphone should be 4s or newer and ipad 2 or newer and iOS device should be iOS 7 or later. For Android devices, it should be 4.3 or later.

To provide support for Facebook users to learn more about recording and sharing 360 videos and photos, the company has launched a dedicated <a href="https://facebook360.fb.com/">website</a>.

All this innovation keeps touting for the insatiable appetite of the users.]]></content:encoded>
